__e: Oh, yes, I do, because you've told me a thousand times!
My girlfriend told me what she wanted for her birthday, like, A hundred times, but I-I didn't listen.
I have said a hundred times already, I've got nothing to do with this.
In fact, the last victim was fod not a hundred yards from where we're standing.
My parents have one a few hundred meters from their cottage.
And you're gonna tell me all that happened a hundred yards from your house and you had no idea what was going on?
Well, I guess if the guy who slept his way through hundreds could find just one...
My girlfriend told me what she wanted for her birthday, like, A hundred times, but I-I didn't listen.
There are like a hundred people that chose you for this thing, and you may not think you know what you're doing, but they sure do. A.D.:
So then this Miss Elvina comes in, she must have been 100 years old, and I tell her, I say, "Roger's just a friend of my family's in cotton," but she won't hear of it, she just wants to talk fish.

And then we'd... fall asleep for like... a thousand years and then, in the morning, we'd wake up and... the sun would be shining and... my mom would go back into the kitchen and start making breakfast and... my dad would say, "Go get ready for school" and smile.
